Marketplace API

  • Authentication
    • Get logged in user via token
    • Login User
    • Register user
    • Update user details
    • Update user password
  • Product
    • Create Product
    • Delete product
    • Get all products
    • Get all products with query parameters
    • Get product
    • Update product
  • Review
    • Add review for a product
    • Delete review
    • Get all reviews
    • Get reviews for a product
    • Get single review
    • Update review
  • User
    • Delete user
    • Get all users
    • Get single user
    • Update user

Authentication 5

Folder for signup, login, logout

Get logged in user via token  |  GET   {{URL}}/api/v1/auth/me


Example Request

URL: {{URL}}/api/v1/auth/me

Example Response

Body
{ "success": true, "data": { "_id": "61ec0d9ca1c85bb9bd395d1d", "name": "Cole Mike", "email": "cole@gmail.com", "role": "user", "createdAt": "2022-01-22T13:58:52.430Z", "updatedAt": "2022-01-22T13:58:52.430Z", "__v": 0 } }
Code:
200
raw

Login User  |  POST   {{URL}}/api/v1/auth/login

Description

Log in user with the right login credentials

Headers
KeyValueDescription
Content-Typeapplication/json

JSON Type

Body
{ "email": "mary@gmail.com", "password": "12345678" }

Example Request

URL: {{URL}}/api/v1/auth/login
Headers
KeyValueDescription
Content-Typeapplication/json

JSON Type

Body
{ "email": "mary@gmail.com", "password": "12345678" }

Example Response

Body
{ "success": true, "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpZCI6IjYxZTcxZDQzMzlkOGQ3ZmFmM2MxZTkyZCIsImlhdCI6MTY0Mjg2MDc1NCwiZXhwIjoxNjQzNzI0NzU0fQ.t78BTK9e2yP9Jk3ge4ksi37o9bYZuPnqhFBJFWNiZqg" }
Code:
200
raw

Register user  |  POST   {{URL}}/api/v1/auth/register

Description

Create an account as either a vendor or as a user (buyer)

Headers
KeyValueDescription
Content-Typeapplication/json

JSON Type

Body
{ "name": "Cole Mike", "email": "cole@gmail.com", "role": "user", "password": "12345678" }

Example Request

URL: {{URL}}/api/v1/auth/register
Headers
KeyValueDescription
Content-Typeapplication/json

JSON Type

Body
{ "name": "Cole Mike", "email": "cole@gmail.com", "role": "user", "password": "12345678" }

Example Response

Body
{ "success": true, "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpZCI6IjYxZWMwZDljYTFjODViYjliZDM5NWQxZCIsImlhdCI6MTY0Mjg1OTkzMiwiZXhwIjoxNjQzNzIzOTMyfQ.9SHCMe5VAGtbsKe4CS1C0QzehjD1XjUTaeUuWVvungo" }
Code:
201
raw

Update user details  |  PUT   {{URL}}/api/v1/auth/updatedetails

Description

User profile update (name, email and phoneNumber) in the database

Headers
KeyValueDescription
Content-Typeapplication/json

JSON Type

Body
{ "name": "David Doe", "email": "david@gmail.com" }

Example Request

URL: {{URL}}/api/v1/auth/updatedetails
Headers
KeyValueDescription
Content-Typeapplication/json

JSON Type

Body
{ "name": "David Doe", "email": "david@gmail.com" }

Example Response

Body
{ "success": true, "data": { "_id": "61ebea9fc48be56bbbd68a89", "name": "David Doe", "email": "david@gmail.com", "role": "vendor", "createdAt": "2022-01-22T11:29:35.639Z", "updatedAt": "2022-01-22T11:44:56.227Z", "__v": 0 } }
Code:
200
raw

Update user password  |  PUT   {{URL}}/api/v1/auth/updatepassword

Description

Update user password in the database.

Headers
KeyValueDescription
Content-Typeapplication/json

JSON Type

Body
{ "currentPassword": "12345678", "newPassword": "23456789" }

Example Request

URL: {{URL}}/api/v1/auth/updatepassword
Headers
KeyValueDescription
Content-Typeapplication/json

JSON Type

Body
{ "currentPassword": "12345678", "newPassword": "23456789" }

Example Response

Body
{ "success": true, "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpZCI6IjYxZWJlYTlmYzQ4YmU1NmJiYmQ2OGE4OSIsImlhdCI6MTY0Mjg1MTg0MSwiZXhwIjoxNjQzNzE1ODQxfQ.hsJZV3lLwmD9fo2lIXQSMp7JwvbwVdr2MEpKvC-7J7A" }
Code:
200

Product 6

Folder for all product APs

raw

Create Product  |  POST   {{URL}}/api/v1/products

Description

Add a product to the database. To create product you have to be either an admin or vendor

Headers
KeyValueDescription
Content-Typeapplication/json

JSON Type

Body
{ "name": "Amazon Echo Dot 3rd Generation", "description": "Meet Echo Dot - Our most popular smart speaker with a fabric design. It is our most compact smart speaker that fits perfectly into small space", "brand": "Amazon", "category": "Electronics", "price": 29.99, "countInStock": 2 }

Example Request

URL: {{URL}}/api/v1/products
Headers
KeyValueDescription
Content-Typeapplication/json

JSON Type

Body
{ "name": "Amazon Echo Dot 3rd Generation", "description": "Meet Echo Dot - Our most popular smart speaker with a fabric design. It is our most compact smart speaker that fits perfectly into small space", "brand": "Amazon", "category": "Electronics", "price": 29.99, "countInStock": 2 }

Example Response

Body
{ "success": true, "data": { "name": "Amazon Echo Dot 3rd Generation", "description": "Meet Echo Dot - Our most popular smart speaker with a fabric design. It is our most compact smart speaker that fits perfectly into small space", "brand": "Amazon", "category": "Electronics", "countInStock": 2, "photo": "no-photo.jpg", "user": "61ebea9fc48be56bbbd68a89", "_id": "61ebeb00c48be56bbbd68a92", "createdAt": "2022-01-22T11:31:12.151Z", "updatedAt": "2022-01-22T11:31:12.151Z", "slug": "amazon-echo-dot-3rd-generation", "__v": 0, "id": "61ebeb00c48be56bbbd68a92" } }
Code:
201

Delete product  |  DELETE   {{URL}}/api/v1/products/61e72dee799d292c0142ef43

Description

Delete product from the database. To delete a product you have to be either an admin or vendor and you have to be the product owner.


Example Request

URL: {{URL}}/api/v1/products/61e72dee799d292c0142ef43

Example Response

Body
{ "success": true, "data": {} }
Code:
200

Get all products with query parameters  |  GET   {{URL}}/api/v1/products

Query
KeyValueDescription
selectname,description
page2
limit2

Example Request

URL: {{URL}}/api/v1/products?select=name,description&page=2&limit=2
Query
KeyValueDescription
selectname,description
page2
limit2

Example Response

Body
{ "success": true, "count": 2, "pagination": { "next": { "page": 3, "limit": 2 }, "prev": { "page": 1, "limit": 2 } }, "data": [ { "_id": "61ebead1c48be56bbbd68a8c", "name": "iPhone 11 Pro 256GB Memory", "description": "Introducing the iPhone 11 Pro. Get product  |  GET   {{URL}}/api/v1/products/61ebead1c48be56bbbd68a8c

Description

Get single product from the database.


Example Request

URL: {{URL}}/api/v1/products/61ebead1c48be56bbbd68a8c

Example Response

Body
{ "success": true, "data": { "_id": "61ebead1c48be56bbbd68a8c", "name": "iPhone 11 Pro 256GB Memory", "description": "Introducing the iPhone 11 Pro. A transformative triple-camera system that adds tons of capability without complexity. Code:
200
raw

Update product  |  PUT   {{URL}}/api/v1/products/61ebead1c48be56bbbd68a8c

Description

Update the product in the database. To update a product you have to be either an admin or vendor and you have to be the product owner.

Headers
KeyValueDescription
Content-Typeapplication/json

JSON Type

Body
{ "name": "iPhone 11 Pro 256GB Memory", "price": 250.45, "countInStock": 4 }

Example Request

URL: {{URL}}/api/v1/products/61ebead1c48be56bbbd68a8c
Headers
KeyValueDescription
Content-Typeapplication/json

JSON Type

Body
{ "name": "iPhone 11 Pro 256GB Memory", "price": 250.45, "countInStock": 4 }

Example Response

Body
{ "success": true, "data": { "_id": "61ebead1c48be56bbbd68a8c", "name": "iPhone 11 Pro 256GB Memory", "description": "Introducing the iPhone 11 Pro. A transformative triple-camera system that adds tons of capability without complexity. An unprecedented leap in battery life", "brand": "Apple", "category": "Phones & Tablets", "countInStock": 4, "photo": "no-photo.jpg", "user": "61ebea9fc48be56bbbd68a89", "createdAt": "2022-01-22T11:30:25.766Z", "updatedAt": "2022-01-22T11:41:54.600Z", "slug": "iphone-11-pro-256gb-memory", "__v": 0, "id": "61ebead1c48be56bbbd68a8c" } }
Code:
200

Review 6

Folder for all the reveiw endpoint

raw

Add review for a product  |  POST   {{URL}}/api/v1/products/61ebe8b7c48be56bbbd68a81/reviews

Description

Create review for a product. To create review you have to be either an admin or user (buyer) and you have to be the review owner

Headers
KeyValueDescription
Content-Typeapplication/json

JSON Type

Body
{ "text": "Affordable and elegant", "rating": 9 }

Example Request

URL: {{URL}}/api/v1/products/61ebe8b7c48be56bbbd68a81/reviews
Headers
KeyValueDescription
Content-Typeapplication/json

JSON Type

Body
{ "text": "Affordable and elegant", "rating": 9 }

Example Response

Body
{ "success": true, "data": { "text": "Affordable and elegant", "rating": 9, "product": "61ebe8b7c48be56bbbd68a81", "user": "61ec0d9ca1c85bb9bd395d1d", "_id": "61ec0e63a1c85bb9bd395d35", "createdAt": "2022-01-22T14:02:11.420Z", "updatedAt": "2022-01-22T14:02:11.420Z", "__v": 0 } }
Code:
201

Delete review  |  DELETE   {{URL}}/api/v1/reviews/61ec0e30a1c85bb9bd395d2e

Description

Delete single review from the database. To delete review you have to be either an admin or user (buyer) and you have to be the review owner.


Example Request

URL: {{URL}}/api/v1/reviews/61ec0e30a1c85bb9bd395d2e

Example Response

Body
{ "success": true, "data": {} }
Code:
200
